choose_language: Choose your preferred language to see content adapt in real-time
demo_description: This demonstration showcases Paraglide's powerful type-safe internationalization system. Watch how content transforms instantly as you switch between languages.
type_safety_desc: Paraglide provides compile-time type safety for all your translations. No more runtime errors from missing or incorrectly typed message parameters.
vscode_integration_desc: Enhanced developer experience with the Sherlock i18n extension. Get autocomplete, validation, and seamless translation management.
how_it_works_subtitle: Paraglide generates type-safe message functions from your translation files
step1_desc: Write your translations in JSON or PO files with parameters
step2_desc: Paraglide generates TypeScript functions with proper types
step3_desc: Import and use with full IntelliSense and type checking
footer_text: This demo showcases real-world internationalization patterns
